attributes.action: Stop the proposed Conservative ban of Trans women from female NHS wards
attributes.additional_details: This ban is outdated and highly discriminatory towards Trans Women. The 2021 NHS guidance that said trans patients could be placed on single-sex wards on the basis of the gender with which they identified should be up held.
attributes.background: We want Parliament/the Government to rethink their proposed plan which sees Trans women being banned from female NHS wards and being forced to get care in a ward which does align with their gender.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647146
